title: (4253) Thalawathugoda, Architect Designed 2 Storied New Luxury House for Sale.
details: Thalawathugoda, Architect Designed 2 Storied New Luxury House for Sale. 3100 sq ft, 4 Bedrooms, 3 Pantry (A/C) With Attached Toilets fitted With Quality fitting fully furnished Solar Hot Water, With Double Garage With Remote Door and all Other Modern amenities. 1km to the Thalawathugoda of Town, in a Private Compound. 398 Million (Negotiable) 39.8 Million
